thread.title: Listen to Future’s New Album ‘HNDRXX’ Right Now
thread.title_full: Listen to Future’s New Album ‘HNDRXX’ Right Now

author: Jacob Davey
title: Listen to Future’s New Album ‘HNDRXX’ Right Now
text:
Barely giving us room to reflect on his last self-titled album, Future has wasted no time in dropping his latest record HNDRXX just a week after his first album of 2017. Sonically, the album is a lot more Emotional Future , and a lot less 808-rolling and ratchet than Future . With features coming in from The Weekend and Rihanna, Future is a lot more introspective and candid on HNDRXX , which you can listen to below. 

Future recently spoke to Zane Lowe about the surprise second album, calling it his most personal album to date and “the album he always wanted to make”. Watch the two-part interview below. 


In other music news, Calvin Harris has dropped “Slide” alongside Frank Ocean & Migos, which you can listen to here .
